email.subject: Damage control
email.body:
It's ALL over the news!
Malvin told me, he has been working with you...
The US Government think they are at war with the Soviets!
They blame it on a computer malfunction! But they say that the problem has been corrected!?
WHAT HAVE YOU DONE!
This is getting too dangerous. The FBI is probaly looking for you now...
YOU are on your on from now on!
Bye and best of luck, - Jim (and Malvin)
Seattle Tech Lab
